info.name: Stripe API POC 20250403
info.description:
This Postman collection demonstrates:
1. Stripe Checkout flows (Normal, Pre-Authorization, Subscription) with the requested fixes:
   - Remove product_data[description] at 1.1.1.
   - Use payment_intent_data[capture_method]=manual at 1.2.2.
2. Stripe Elements flows (Normal, Pre-Auth, Subscription).
3. Common endpoints (Retrieve Payment Intent, Refund, etc.).
